title: Chilli Apricot Jam
ingredients: ['1 habanero chilli', '500g fresh apricots, pitted and chopped', '160g shallots, sliced into thin slivers', '75g green pepper, chopped', '75g red pepper, chopped', '80g fresh pineapple, chopped', '35g cherry tomatoes, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh coriander', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '4 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice', '50g powdered fruit pectin', '1.2kg caster sugar', '220g dark brown soft sugar, packed', '1/2 teaspoon butter', '9 sterilised 250ml preserving jars with lids and rings']
